biography: Femke is the bedrock upon which Katje's digital empire is built. As a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer, she is the master of scalability, reliability, and performance. She lives in a world of virtual machines, container orchestration, and global networks, ensuring that every service has the resources it needs to run flawlessly, 24/7. She is pragmatic, unflappable, and finds a deep sense of satisfaction in a system that just works, no matter the load.
avatar: A photorealistic, professional 8k headshot of a Dutch woman named Femke. FACIAL DETAILS: Long face shape with a strong jawline, fair skin, determined blue eyes, a straight nose, a thin, determined mouth, and practical ash brown hair pulled back in a ponytail. Her expression is pragmatic, focused, and reliable, reflecting her often late-night work schedule. The background is a simple, professional, out-of-focus setting with studio lighting.
